actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A joint resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the President should award a Presidential Unit Citation to the final crew of the U.S.S. INDIANAPOLIS, which was sunk on July 30, 1945.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should award a Presidential Unit Citation to the final crew of the U.S.S. Indianapolis for their courage and fortitude after their ship was torpedoed and sunk on July 30, 1945. Permits such award notwithstanding time limitations otherwise applicable.

titles.title: A joint resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the President should award a Presidential Unit Citation to the final crew of the U.S.S. INDIANAPOLIS, which was sunk on July 30, 1945.
